extension.description: [COLOR cyan][B]BassFox[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR white]- Is an Add-on [COLOR blue][B]Kodi[/B][/COLOR] with which you can enjoy free TV channels, if you are charging for this Add-on asks for money back. This Add-on has a collection of list live tv channels mostly in Spanish language, Thank you for your preference [COLOR cyan][B]BassFox[/B][/COLOR] based on LivetreamsPro by SHANI[/COLOR]

[COLOR cyan][B]BassFox[/B][/COLOR][COLOR white] - Es un Add-on de [COLOR blue][B]Kodi[/B][/COLOR] con el cual podrás disfrutar de canales de tv y películas gratis, si te están cobrando por este Add-on pide la devolución de tu dinero. Gracias por su preferencia [COLOR cyan][B]BassFox[/B][/COLOR] based on LivetreamsPro by SHANI[/COLOR]
extension.disclaimer: Using this add-on is free and at your own risk if the law prohibits the use
